ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Unable to setup crawl modules
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe the order.xml files is corrupted? Check the file with xmllint (for example): $: xmllint order.xml  /dev/null; echo $? Take care, i.

Maybe the order.xml files is corrupted?

Check the file with xmllint (for example):

$: xmllint order.xml > /dev/null; echo $?

Take care,
i.

sonjaschaule wrote:
> Hello,
> 
> I am new to heritrix and stuck with a problem.
> 
> I am running HEritrix on the latest ubuntu distribution;
> 
> When I start a crawl, the job is immediately sent to the list of
> completed jobs without being initialized. I fet the error message:
> 
> /Unable to setup crawl modules Exception: java.lang.NullPointerException/
> 
> and
> /Level: WARNING Message: no root element: U+ffffffff in
> 'file:../order.xml', line: 1, column: 1/
> 
> I have set the HTTP header's user-agent and from attributes to valid
> values, so I think it is a different prolem.
> 
> It would be great if someone can help.
> Thanks in advance.
> 
> Sonja Schaule
